What are the treatments for congenital dyserythropoietic anemia ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of CDA:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Congenital Dyserythropoietic Anemia Type I  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital dyserythropoietic anemia, type I  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital dyserythropoietic anemia, type II  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital dyserythropoietic anemia, type III  - Med
